name: transition
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a change from one form or type to another, or the process by which this happens

example.eg: The health-care system is in transition at the moment.
example.egtrans: 医疗保健制度目前正在变革中。

example.eg: There will be an interim government to oversee the transition to democracy.
example.egtrans: 将会有一个临时政府来监督向民主政治的过渡。

trans_examp.trans_en: a change in which someone starts living their life as a person of a different gender

example.eg: She began her transition from male to female almost seven years ago.
example.egtrans: 大约七年前，她开始了从男性到女性的转变。

name: transition
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to start living as a person of a different gender

example.eg: Bornstein transitioned from male to female almost 20 years ago.
example.egtrans: 大约20年前，伯恩斯坦从男人变成了女人。

example.eg: It wasn't easy transitioning gender in the military.
example.egtrans: 在军队中转换性别并不容易。
